title: Let’s Talk About Hogwarts Legacy Reviews - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.06.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Hogwarts Legacy reviews are up and we (and many other outlets) don't have one. Let's talk about why that is.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:33 - Housekeeping
  - A new Last of Us HBO episode breakdown is up right now. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
  - Ant-Man and The Wasp in review rewatch is up right now featuring Erik Voss from New Rockstars. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
The Roper Report   -
00:07:36 - Hogwarts Legacy review round up
00:22:55 - Assassin's Creed Valhalla Dawn of Ragnarok has won a Grammy
00:27:29 - Dragon Age Dreadwolf gameplay leaks, showing ‘God of War-style’ combat
00:31:18 - Star Wars Jedi: Survivor Adds Much Requested Fast Travel Feature
00:34:56 - The Last Case of Benedict Fox gets a release date!
00:38:51 - Out today
00:44:09 - Required Reading: https://blog.playstation.com/2023/02/06/mlb-the-show-23-new-storylines-mode-the-negro-leagues-season-1/
00:46:52 - You‘re Wrong

it certainly weighed down by technical issues a lackluster main story and some poor enemy variety but even those couldn't come close to Breaking its enchanting spell over me Josh West at Games Radar gave it a 3.5 out of 5 and said Hogwarts Legacy is a solid first attempt if Avalanche can be accused of anything is that the studio has tried to do too much all at once something was always going to give between the massive open world the messy RPG economy exciting action combat an adventure story that wants to cast you as a hero with homework due on Monday and then oi Governor cousin McDonald at the guardian gave it 3 out of 5 stars wrote Hogwarts Legacy derives its magic from its setting not from its game design which is competent but unspectacular battling with spells is thrilling for the first few hours then incredibly fiddly to control as you accumulate more enchantments to slot into swappable skill Wheels it has a bunch of weird quirks that are straight out of the 2010s when you
